name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Cloud Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and cloud architecture. Proficient in utilizing **GCP**, **AWS**, and **Azure**, complemented by expertise in **Python** and **Node.js** for developing scalable, high-performing solutions. Demonstrated ability with **CI/CD** pipelines, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and automation tools like **Ansible** to enhance deployment efficiency and system reliability. Strong background in **cloud networking**, **cloud security**, and implementing centralized logging and monitoring tools, guaranteeing robust infrastructure management. Proven success in leading impactful cloud projects at prestigious firms, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, while cultivating a deep understanding of both **Linux** and **Windows** environments.
